00019 void ConnectorListener::Connected(Service& TheService, const SimpleString LocalConnectorName, unsigned int PeerId)
00020 {
00021         OmiscidTrace( "A new peer %8.8x connects to %s:%s.\n", PeerId, TheService.GetName().GetStr(), LocalConnectorName.GetStr() );

00032 {
00033         OmiscidTrace( "The peer %8.8x disconnects from %s:%s.\n", PeerId, TheService.GetName().GetStr(), LocalConnectorName.GetStr() );

00048 void ConnectorListener::Receive(MsgSocket& ConnectionPoint, MsgSocketCallBackData& CallbackData)
00049 {
00050         // Call the User Friendly interface
00051         MessageReceived( *ServiceOfTheConnector, ConnectionPoint.GetName(), CallbackData.Msg );

00055 {
